item.title: Javascript Notes 2 ES6
item.author: Author
item.description: JavaScript ES6 Overview ECMAScript is a standardized version of JavaScript with the goal of unifying the language’s specifications and features. As all major browsers and JavaScript-runtimes follow this specification, the term ECMAScript is interchangeable with the term JavaScript. Syntax let and const Variables declared with let and const are scoped to the block{ }, not to the function. Variables declared with let and const can only be accessed after they have been declared.
